revised_title: On the Brom-Iodides and Their Reactions with Olefines and Haloid Ethers
tldr: Dr. Maxwell Simpson investigates the direct combination of bromide of iodine with olefines and non-saturated haloid ethers, forming new compounds such as brom-iodide of ethylene, brom-iodide of propylene, and iodo-dibrom-vinyl. These compounds have unique properties and reactions, expanding our understanding of bromine and iodine chemistry.
